org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReferenceManager

type
class
this class abstract and manages the interaction with a native DOM. Native DOM element element are abstracted as NativeReference. It manages the native references path, allowing to retrieve native reference with path It abstracts the creation of new native element by mimicking the HTML way of creating new element. This class proxies method call to runtime specific implementations

Static Methods

createNativeReference(nativeReferenceType : NativeReferenceTypeValue) : NativeReference

parameters
nativeReferenceType the type of element to create (graphic, text...)
Instantiate a native element and returns a reference to it

getRoot() : NativeReference

Returns the native DOM root of the current runtime, for instance the Body element in HTML
